Cleaning tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean tight spaces, such as between keyboard keys, inside ear canals, or in the crevices of small appliances.
Hair styling tool: A toothbrush can be used to detangle hair, style hair, or even add volume to fine hair.
Precision tool: Toothbrushes can be used as precision tools for tasks such as cleaning jewelry, cleaning small electronics, or even as a small paintbrush for tiny projects.
Pet grooming tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean teeth, brush fur, or remove loose hair from pets.
Kitchen tool: Toothbrushes can be used to clean hard-to-reach areas in the kitchen, such as the back of the oven or between the keys on a keyboard.
